# SVUnit command

## Specific flags

```
--cover
```

## Command

```
runSVUnit --cover --sim questa --uvm --test tests/<uut_name>_ut.sv --r_arg "-L work -L <uut required libs>"
```

# vsim & vopt flags generated by adding runSVUnit --cover

## Specific flags

```
-coverage
-voptargs="+acc"
-voptargs="+cover=/testrunner/__ts."
-assertdebug -voptargs="+acc"
```

## Command

Impact of runSVUnit --cover on the generated vsim command is as following:

```
vsim -L work -L <uut required libs> -coverage -voptargs="+cover=/testrunner/__ts." -assertdebug -voptargs="+acc" -do "run 0; coverage attr -name TESTNAME -value tests/lvds_ut; coverage save -onexit ./tests/lvds_ut.ucdb; run -all; quit -f" testrunner
```

# Coverage report generation

Run separately after the simulation is over.

```
vcover report -html tests/<uut_name>_ut.ucdb -out ./html/<uut_name>_ut -annotate -details -codeAll -assert -cvg -directive
```
